Create a documentary about a local community that is facing a pressing issue. The film can follow the journey of the community members as they work together to find a solution. This can be a great way to showcase the power of community and the impact that collective action can have.

Produce a documentary about a person who has achieved great success in their field, but has also faced significant challenges along the way. The film can explore their journey, their motivations, and the lessons they have learned along the way. This can be a great way to inspire others and show that success is not always easy.

Direct a documentary about a person or group of people who have made a significant impact on the world. The film can explore their background, their motivations, and the impact they have had on the world. This can be a great way to showcase the power of individualctions and the impact they can have on the world.

Produce a documentary about a person or group of people who are working to make a positive impact on the environment. The film can explore their motivations, their actions, and the impact they are having on the environment. This can be a great way to raise awareness about important environmental issues and inspire others to take action.

Direct a documentary about a person or group of people who are working to make a positive impact on social justice issues. The film can explore their motivations, their actions, and the impact they are having on social justice issues. This can be a great way to raise awareness about important social justice issues and inspire others to take action.
